Posts.Content: Dec 26, 2012 02:45PM momtopiglet wrote: Yes! I had nausea as well.  In fact, I even took a pregnancy test, just to cover all my bases. (Not pregnant, BTW). No one at my house had a virus, and my diet was totally normal.  While the RO nurse said she doubted it was the radiation, she said she couldn't guarantee it wasn't, so she prescribed some phenergan.
Posts.Title: radiation and nausea gracie1125 jennsmc

Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2012 04:48AM momtopiglet wrote: Hi ladies- I know I'm late jumping in here (although I've been hangin' out over in the radiation forum), but I had a lumpectomy and SNB back in October.  I still have noticeable numbness in the underarm area, and occassional burning in the area right behind it.  Is everyone pretty much recovered from surgery already?  This numbness is making me CRAZY, and I sure hope this isn't my new normal, because it gives me the creeps   I'm not sure how to phrase this, but.....how is everyone's underarm recovery coming along so I can compare notes?
Posts.Title: October 2012 Surgery? Leigh22 ConnieGreene
